data.name: THNT
data.detailed_description:
COMMUnity

Join our Discord server for the latest news & updates!


About the Game

The first thing you see is the inside of a prison cell. You have no recollection of the past and clues to what happened are scarce. The body you used to have is gone and your consciousness now resides in an artificial construction. But something else feels off... a sinister presence lurks in the shadows and the only way out leads you straight to the very thing that is set on hunting you down.




THNT is an action packed first-person shooter. Inspired by classic FPS titles, it also brings modern mechanics into the mix.

  • Unforgiving combat
    AI has you in its crosshairs, do not expect a break.

  • Advanced damage system
    Force heavy hitters to retreat by turning their guns into scrap. Make agile opponents crawl like a snail. A well placed hit can instantly shift odds in your favor.

  • Play it the way you want
    Jetpack your way around the environment or slow down time to get out of a tight spot. There is no ultimate build or strategy - use player upgrades, special abilities and weapon variants to enhance your own playstyle.

Make sure to check out the soundtrack!
